variants.Description in input context: L166P point mutation in DJ-1 associated with increased cell death

Experiment Method.Assay Method: siRNA Knockdown and Cell Viability Assay

Material used.Description: The experiment used SH-SY5Y neuroblastoma cells to assess the effects of DJ-1 knockdown and mutant forms on cell death.

Readout description.Result Description: Mutant DJ-1 (L166P) significantly increased cell death compared to wild-type DJ-1 after siRNA knockdown.
